chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

The battery lasts less than expected.

Thank you,

Hello Lucía:
You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is most convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do
Return Preparation:
1. Check the instructions on how to return a product.
2. Do not forget to include any accessories that came with your item.
3. Remove any protective film or screen protector that it has.
4. Pack the article and its accessories following these guidelines.
Packing Instructions for the Article:
• The box must be strong and resistant. You should place the article safely inside the box so that it does not move during transportation.
• Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add an additional label on the inside to help identify the shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged).
• Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case the article is damaged during transportation.
The return is ready for shipping! We'll let you know when it arrives.
Best regards,
Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
The battery drains too quickly.
Thank you,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Paula Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
